Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection

Positive_Review: the location is very good the breakfast is good the staff is excellent although the rooms are small I will return to this hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: That they don t have a functioning kitchen only prepared meals
Positive_Review: It s location and friendliness of the staff The room was extremely comfortable and perfect for one person A true parisian feel

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The wifi was unacceptably slow The tub was also quite high which made it a bit tricky getting into and out of the shower The music in the lobby was awful
Positive_Review: The room was a decent size for Paris The breakfast reasonable and the staff friendly

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: A little expensive but probably not for this part of Paris
Positive_Review: Although small the room was very well equipped and everything worked especially the air con Layout made best use of space Perfect location close to sights and public transport Beds comfy Quiet position in side street

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Wi fi You have to log in each time you switch on the app
Positive_Review: Comfy bed perfect pillows you sleep like a log The receptionists are really helpful If they gave you a choice instead of ordering trips through companies they cooperate with they would be just perfect

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Drinks at breakfast were serve yourself from a pouring flask so not hot unless just filled up Quite a cramped breakfast room
Positive_Review: Room was large and comfortable Bathroom was exceptionally well equipped

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The croissants Being in Paris one expects to have fresh croissants and fresh orange juice just a constructive suggestion
Positive_Review: Location and comfort

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: I can t imagine anything better
Positive_Review: Best value in Paris Eggs great breakfast was great room was great services never lacking personnel exquisite just the best

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Phone beside bed did not always make connection
Positive_Review: Did not have time to use Wi Fi Like that they had newspapers available each day Room decor very elegant and soothing Very clean Very quiet Great location

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: The room was spacious comfortable and beautiful The staff was overwhelmingly friendly and helpful The breakfast more than adequate and the location was adequately near the metro and galleries Lafayette also near a grocery and all other places to eat in Will definitely stay there again on our next trip No need to search for more

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The wifi was free but my connection failed to work on several occasions When it did work the speed was great
Positive_Review: Great location quiet street comfortable room on the 6th floor with very good airconditioning that was actually very quiet Easy walking distance from Metro

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Would have loved to have coffee capsules since the room had a coffee machine
Positive_Review: I very much liked the the room breakfast staff over all atmosphare and everything about the hotel It was calm beautiful and a lovely Parisian style hotel in the city center easy to quickly get to many places Also an upgrade of the room was kind for the hotel provided me the calm stay on my business trip they promised and more

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: The beds and pillows were fantastic but the all the staff really made it for us in particular we loved the night manager at the desk he was informed and friendly We had two rooms off a private corridor which was great for a sisters trip The breakfast was great with sufficient range to choose something different each day The croissants were below average but the bread and all else were spot on

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Room decor dated the curtains and wall area feel quiet at night as it s nestled in a quiet lane Far from metro
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent warm and helpful Lots of asian eateries around that area Room very clean can smell the nice warm sheets that were freshly washed and pressed Shower water temp and flow was great bed and pillows comfy room size not too cramped for the price

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Room is kind of small and minimum equipment
Positive_Review: Staffs are friendly and kind great location to walk around center of the city and I enjoyed breakfast a lot

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The tiny elevator for saying something
Positive_Review: This was a reward travel for me and my elder sister the language limits a little but we were lucky with Fernando he made us feel good with his kindness

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: house keeping services needs to be improved Since we are vegetarians there were not many choices for vegetarian food in the breakfast And last day they also charged us for a natural omelette that we requested for bathroom was too small and inconvenient
Positive_Review: staff were friendly

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The plugs for mobile phones and tablets are difficult to reach Same applies to plugging of the electric tea pot thus making tea rather difficult
Positive_Review: This is an elegant and comfortable hotel located in heart of Paris between the Opera and the Louvre Tourist Office Shopping Cafes restaurant are all in a walking distance Metro station is five minutes away The rooms are nicely decorated and breakfast is good Wifi works well even on the sixth floor The staff is outstanding professional helpful and well informed

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: One way street system around the hotel
Positive_Review: The location was excellent with great access to bars restaurants and famous landmarks all in easy walking distance

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: friendly and helpful staff great location beside The Opera and a short walk from the Louvre and other major attractions excellent breakfast and comfortable accommodation

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Bad bar staff They regularly abandon the bar so that they can chat with reception staff Trying to get a drink is hard work They are not at all interested in running the bar Bad atmosphere Forget this hotel if you enjoy a lobby lounge experience
Positive_Review: Good bed Central location Nice staff

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Small wc in room 408 i couldnt fit in it Furnitures are becoming old for a 4 star hotel Lighting in the room was weak Need more light Cleanliness is not wow Lamps are so dirty
Positive_Review: Location smiling staff and helpfull

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Basically it felt like poor value for money The staff were helpful but aloof and overall it just felt like a lot to pay for what was essentially a tiny bedroom with an attached bathroom Also they claim to have very good internet but this just wasn t the case and I had a number of times where I had problems with the connectivity for example video conferencing or doing anything more advanced than mail or web browsing
Positive_Review: Location between Opera and the Louvre was very convenient

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: WiFi is ok but could be better
Positive_Review: Excellent location Close to Opera Metro Galeries Lafayette and Louvre area Great restaurants nearby particularly enjoyed Le Petit Colbert

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: Loved the decor the hotel felt like a home from home just one little negative didn t like the strong smell of air freshener when I first entered room opened window and soon got rid of it would certainly stay here again

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The assortment of menu in lobby bar Not enough meals to order for supper or lunch
Positive_Review: Unfortunately we left hotel early morning without breakfast Calm and cosy room convenient place to investigate Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: The girl in reception was very helpful with restaurants and other information The man who took our luggage upstairs and managed the taxi in the morning was extremely efficient The breakfast was above average and the room was exactly as we has ordered Balcony non smoking and twin beds I prefer this location in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: Metro many shops and restaurants are just a few steps from the hotel The location is really great All the staffs are friendly and helpful Great breakfast too

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The smallest hotel bathroom I ve ever come across Very little privacy when using it as the sliding door to it right by the bed
Positive_Review: Lovely breakfasts

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: I just couldn t believe the missing basics Maybe a bit spoiled having stayed at some lovely hotels but given it has 4 stars and the price no robe really awful towels mediocre bathroom products no complimentary water biscuits in tea tray not renewed next day door key needed to be re programmed three times kettle lead was silly short so I had to keep pulling furniture about to plug it in No spare blanket and I was cold as it had rained a lot I think Best Western are sitting on their laurels due to the great location but need to up their game It was a bit faded and just not that enjoyable an experience This doesn t include the fact they took the money off my card before I arrived I had wanted to pay in cash for the room and had the euros with me
Positive_Review: The barman was lovely friendly and accommodating The location was brilliant quiet but central

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Nothing Even though they do not have a restaurant there is a meal service in the bar
Positive_Review: Staff very helpful an arranged a special restaurant for my wife s birthday dinner Very cosy and VERY convenient for Paris city

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: All the staff were lovely and helpful The room was great and clean Location is very close to a train station and a close walk to the galleria Lafayette

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: the breakfast was good but not well organized there was always something missing when you brought it to their attention it was swiftly brought to you
Positive_Review: The staff were smiled all the time and were always helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: 1 elevator was out for 2 days and the wait was a little long for the only operating elevator
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly and cooperative breakfast always being refilled

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: We were booked into a smoking room by mistake despite having requested a non smoking room on the reservation but this was quickly remedied as non smoking rooms were fortunately available
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly and helpful as we looked for areas to see in Paris The breakfast area was clean and tidy with very attentive staff

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: The hotel is located in a quiet street and walking distance from Opera metro station We had dinner at the hotel and food was excellent and service good

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a great location and such a beautiful looking hotel the staff were very helpful and friendly our room was made up and cleaned everyday we had breakfast included in our stay so much to choose from could not fault anything

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: We stay in this hotel for the 2d time The location is very good just a few steps from the Opera Garnier and the big stores like Galleries Lafayette and Printemps The Breakfast is also very good there are even hot omelet and sausages The room is relatively big if compare with other Paris hotels Wi fi functions without interruptions I can fully recommend

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staff Nice small lounnge and bar area Clean well maintained French classical design A lovely quiet and peaceful little hotel in which to stay while visiting Paris Special Note Not a good place for large groups But perfect for families or couples travelling together

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: I can find no negative points regarding the hotel
Positive_Review: Everything about the Hotel suited us as it was clean tidy with friendly professional staff The room was really comfortable and we both got a good nights sleep The position of the hotel is very central yet located in a quiet street We were impressed with the wonderful selection at breakfast and the staff kept everything clean tidy and replenished

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Bathroom was a little cramped but otherwise fine No real issues
Positive_Review: Comfortable lounge and bar serving a reasonable choice of light evening meals snacks which was just what we wanted for an overnight stay Perfectly good hotel for our stopover

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: Second time we have stayed in this hotel staff very pleasant and helpful The hotel is clean and comfortable Within easy walking distance to the Louvre and other attractions

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: leaving key by door for lights to work using credit card to access safe extremely small bathroom with tv speaker in it is strange wish front desk would have been more informative about dinner options besides giving us a pice of paper
Positive_Review: Location free wifi decent continental breakfast nice to have safe in room we had adjoining rooms very unique setup and liked the set up for having adult children honored my request for quiet room and Terrasse

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The air conditioning was barely adequate even during my mid June stay when outside temperatures were moderate
Positive_Review: The responsiveness of the staff was exceptional and both the public spaces and the room itself were substantial and comfortable

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: Great location only a short walk from Opera Metro Reasonable size room with a comfortable bed and lots of storage Good breakfast with plenty of choice We found all staff to be very helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The breakfast room is too small and the staff there uncoordinated
Positive_Review: Reception staff were very friendly and helpful the room was fine on 5th floor Location brilliant for opera shops roissybus metro connection good for most lines The breakfast itself was a good variety pity about the staff there

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: There was no suitable electric socket outlet to plug in the water heating kettle in any of the rooms To plug in the kettle I had to crawl under the luggage stool next to the table and had to boil the water on the floor carpet under the stool there It was quite degrading and not hygienic at all
Positive_Review: Large rooms good bed Both bathroom and bar were well equipped with all the usual necessities Attentive front desk staff dutifully assisted me with all my extra requests and questions

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: We had to take a taxi or Uber to get most everywhere we wanted to go
Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly and helpful and the hotel was well maintained and comfortable We also appreciated that most staff spoke English

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The hotel by itself by my side of view it deserves 2 stars Small rooms Dust everywhere also on doors Wind blowing from windows for this reason it was quite cold in the room Lucky for us we got an old electric heating which saved us from ice age So for this we need thank once again hotel staff Breakfast was really poor for 4 stars hotel All the time needed to ask for forks knife or water
Positive_Review: Excellent staff of the hotel They really trying to do everything Especially a big thanks for Ye JIN and Alice

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Positive_Review: It was right in a lovely part of Paris within walking or cycling distance to all the sites Staff were great hotel was clean and very comfortable

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The room is too old and too small for close to 200 euro per night hotel Actually later in the evening I found a number of Asain restaurants Japanese Korean Thai Chinese within 50 100 meters from the hotels but whenasked in themorning the staff looked up in the computer and advised the one far from the hotel should have had knowledge of what choices are available around the hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: The room we were moved to was 307 We had absolutely no wifi access because the room as in the corner so the signal was extremely weak Also the windows were not double glazed we could hear people s footsteps on the pavement outside We weren t able to sleep well as any cars lorries making sounds woke us up
Positive_Review: The location was perfect The staff offering to help us find tickets for attractions as well was great We were initially taken to a room that smelt very badly of cigarettes we asked to change and immidately they changed us

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: A lot of textile in interior carpets curtains gobelin on the walls instead of paper Soooo everywhere is fug I never had allergy but there it started in few minutes i couldn t breathe I went downstairs and talked with receptionist to leave and give my money back So they took money only for 1 night thanks for that But generally please think twice before go there really it s impossible to breathe there and cleaning will not help It is problem of textile

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
Negative_Review: Way way overpriced for what it offers inaccurate cleaning of the rooms dirty glasses and cups not removed some of bathroom products not replaced Do NOT pay so much for that breakfast

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection

Positive_Review: The location

Hotel_Name: H tel Horset Op ra Best Western Premier Collection
